title: Jack Richeson Tempera Powdered Paint, Blue, 1 Pound, (Pack of 1)

description: Powder Paint is convenient and easy to use. Mix equal parts of Powder Paint and water. For thinner washes add more water, for thicker, more rich colors add a bit less water. Caution, pigments may stain. We recommend wearing an apron during use. AP Certified.
